name: firefly-rpc
description: - Use Rustup to install the Rust nightly toolchain. - Install wasm-pack, for example with `cargo install wasm-pack`. - Run `wasm-pack build --target web` to build the rust code into a js package. - Use a web server without CORS to serve the files.   - For example execute `sfz --port 8000 --coi -r` in the root directory.
